name: Comic Fanfiction Words Finding
description:
Exercise your brain everyday with this word finding game. All are about names of the comic heroes. This is the new kind of word puzzle. Find thousands of words in the biggest word search ever. This simple app is fun and very addictive at the same time which require most attention and focus.

if the words are correct, you will receive the scores. We've also included different quests in the game to make it more interesting and fun.
